rishikesh.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • rishikesh.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class for shapes such as Circle, Rectangle and Line modeled for processing.js
    Version:
    9.20.2017
    Author:
    rdevanathan686

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_FILL_COLOR
      Default value of the fillColor of a shape is white
      static int DEFAULT_STROKE_COLOR
      Default value of the strokeColor of a shape is black
      static int DEFAULT_STROKE_WEIGHT
      Default value of the strokeWeight of a shape is 1 px
      protected double x
      The x and y coordinates of the shape
      protected double y
      The x and y coordinates of the shape

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape()
      Default constructor that calls the x, y constructor to set x, y to zero, strokeWeight to 1, fillColor to white and strokeColor to black
      Shape(double x, double y)
      x, y constructor that calls the x, y, strokeWeight, fillColor and strokeColor constructor to set x and y to zero, strokeWeight to 1, fillColor to white and strokeColor to black
      Shape(double x, double y, int strokeWeight, int fillColor, int strokeColor)
      x, y, strokeWeight, fillColor and strokeColor constructor that sets x and y to zero, strokeWeight to 1, fillColor to white and strokeColor to black

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape()
        Default constructor that calls the x, y constructor to set x, y to zero, strokeWeight to 1, fillColor to white and strokeColor to black

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y)
        x, y constructor that calls the x, y, strokeWeight, fillColor and strokeColor constructor to set x and y to zero, strokeWeight to 1, fillColor to white and strokeColor to black
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinates of the shape
        y - the y coordinates of the shape

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             int strokeWeight,
             int fillColor,
             int strokeColor)
        x, y, strokeWeight, fillColor and strokeColor constructor that sets x and y to zero, strokeWeight to 1, fillColor to white and strokeColor to black
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinates of the shape
        y - the x coordinates of the shape
        strokeWeight - the strokeWeight of the shape; must be > 0 or it'll be set to the default stroke weight
        fillColor -
        strokeColor -

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        Determines whether the point x,y is contained inside the Shape
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the point to check
        y - the y-coordinate of the point to check
        Returns:
        boolean value representing whether the point is contained in the Shape

      • move

                 double y)
        Moves the shape to the specified x,y coordinate
        Parameters:

        y - the y-coordinate to move to

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(double xVel,
                   double yVel)
        Moves the shape by the specified velocity
        Parameters:
        xVel - the velocity of the shape in the x-direction
        yVel - the velocity of the shape in the y-direction

      • setFillColor

        public boolean setFillColor(int fillColor)
        Sets the fill color of the shape to the specified fill color
        Parameters:
        fillColor - the fillColor to replace the current fillColor with
        Returns:
        true if it's set to the new value and false if not
        Precondition:
        the fillColor must be a valid color between white and black
        Postcondition:
        fill color of the shape may not be set if the param is not a valid color

      • setStrokeColor

        public boolean setStrokeColor(int strokeColor)
        Sets the stroke color of the shape to the specified stroke color
        Parameters:
        strokeColor - the strokeColor to replace the current strokeColor with
        Returns:
        true if it's set to the new value and false if not
        Precondition:
        the strokeColor must be a valid color between white and black
        Postcondition:
        stroke color of the shape may not be set if the param is not a valid color

      • setStrokeWeight

        public boolean setStrokeWeight(int strokeWeight)
        Sets the stroke weight of the shape to the specified stroke weight
        Parameters:
        strokeWeight - the stroke weight to replace the current stroke weight with
        Returns:
        true if it's set to the new value and false if not
        Precondition:
        strokeWeight must be grater than zero
        Postcondition:
        strokeWeight of the shape may not be set if the param is less than zero

      • setX

        public void setX(double x)
        Sets the x-coordinate of the shape to the specified x-coordinate
        Parameters:
        x - - the x-coordinate to replace the current x-coordinate with
